PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Raymond Aron Papers)//EN" "Aron (Raymond) Papers" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Raymond Aron Papers, 1916-1998
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Writings, notes, correspondence, and printed matter, relating to twentieth-century political and social thought, especially with reference to philosophy of history, political ideology and social structure, and especially with reference to France and Europe. Includes hard photocopies of a few items.

altformavail.head: Originals
altformavail.p: Originals in: Centres de Recherches politiques Raymond Aron, Paris.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: May not be used without permission of Dominique Schnapper, or, after her death, of Antoine Schnapper or children of Dominique and Antoine Schnapper. Reels 19-38 closed until 2044 October 10.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Raymond Aron Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Writings, notes, correspondence, and printed matter, relating to twentieth-century political and social thought, especially with reference to philosophy of history, political ideology and social structure, and especially with reference to France and Europe. Includes hard photocopies of a few items.

did.physdesc: Manuscrits, tapuscrits et notes de travail

did.unittitle: - La crise du Xxe siècle (1945/46 et 46/47)
- Cent ans de manifeste communiste (1947/48: et 1948/49)
- Commission de Conseil pour le choix du professeur étranger associé
- Le développement de la société industrielle et la stratification sociale (1955/56 et 1956/57)
- Esquisse d'une théorie des relations internationales (1958/59 et 1959/60)
- Les Grandes doctrines de la sociologie historique (1960/61 et 1961/62)
- De la pensée et de l'action (1966/67)
